title: Print, "Citibank envelope design", ca. 1975
inscribed: Printed in orange ink, upper center: CITIBANK. Printed in gray ink, left margin: Citibank, N.A./825 Central Avenue/Scarsdale, N.Y./10583.
description: Two thin black horizontal lines, separated by about one inch, run width of paper, about a third of the height down. Aligned right above first line is orange Citibank logotype (rendered in caps sans-serif) and logo. Aligned left below same line is Citibank address.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Citibank envelope design", ca. 1975.
ca. 1975. Letterpress on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-52.
